website_summaries.verdict: An exceedingly popular kitchen mat, this product impresses for its remarkable comfort and clever design.
pros: Boasts beveled edges, making the mat's corners curl-proof
Offers a variety of stylish designs, colors, and lengths
Ergo-foam design ensures feet, legs, and back stay pain-free
cons: A few customers complained that the mat does not hold its shape after heavy use

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I like this mat. Clearly, it is very highly rated, even by those who rate these. I mean, I checked it out on the internet before I purchased it. It was rated number one. For me, I was a bit disappointed to find the back is like a piece of foam, which makes it difficult to wipe off. Surely, it does not slip and slide, but I need to clean it, too. I thought of returning it, but I have since decided to take it to a farm warehouse, where it will work beautifully, and use it there instead of in the house.
customer_reviews.author: PrairieRose55

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my disabled girlfriend who is unable to walk at all although she can crawl. She sits on her legs folded back underneath her while preparing a meal. This mat helps prevents any pressure sores on her legs/knees or any other discomfort. (She is only 4 ft tall if she could stand). The size is good and works perfectly for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Valkrie

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost! You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I have these next to all my kitchen counters, and in front of the fridge and sink. Also in the laundry room. They are great! Most are positioned side-by-side, but the short one I have at the end of the bar area does slip on the floor a lot; I will try some non-skid pad under it.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz2aTee

customer_reviews.title: A must have...
customer_reviews.text: I have a spine injury and standing for any length of time is painful. This mat helps me stand at the stove longer. It's soft but not too soft and the angled edges keep me from tripping. An all around awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Humbert

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been complaining of Hip pain for months and nothing seemed to help until she stood on one of these floor mats at her aunts house. She said it just seems to take away her hip joint pain by takings all the weight off of her joints. Once I knew there was something that could help to alleviate the pain in my wife's hips I bought one of these. She loves IT! I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It works well to keep my feet and legs from hurting while working in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort wise ok but not absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I actually had to return it because I really wanted a rug that absorb the oil spread on the floor, but comfort wise this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is really easy on the feet and legs. I don't even mind doing dishes now!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and it is thick and comfy. I like that they don't slide much. I am glad we switch from rugs.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler c

customer_reviews.title: sooooo wonderful to stand on especially when you have a sink full of dishes
customer_reviews.text: well designed, no more achy legs or feet if you stand at the sink or food prep for hours
customer_reviews.author: R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: GOOD-BYE TO MY BATHROOM RUGS
customer_reviews.text: I use this mat at my bathroom sink in lieu of a rug. I no longer have to purchase another rug or launder it. This mat is durable, cushioney, and skid proof. Easy to keep clean and sanitize. Just wipe down with a micro-fiber cloth and you are good-to-go.
customer_reviews.author: Nascar Girl

customer_reviews.title: The burgundy color is so pretty w my cherry cabinets
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for in front of my fridge and stove. The burgundy color is so pretty w my cherry cabinets. They are so thick and comfortable to stand on.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H Benson

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for your feet in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Squishy, comfortable, great color and quality! We have hard tile floors, I have foot problems and I hate wearing shoes, even though I know they support my feet - but I especially hate wearing shoes in the house. This mat is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: WOW what a different feeling
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen floor map is wonderful and is really easy on the feet
customer_reviews.author: Robert Covell

customer_reviews.title: Relieve backpain while standing
customer_reviews.text: This foam floor mat has relieved a lot of pain while standing over a workbench, kitchen stove or sink. It cushions your weight by taking stress off your hips and back. Highly recommend this to relieve discomfort while standing.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Kilz

customer_reviews.title: Comfort mat
customer_reviews.text: Great product and extremely comfortable in front of kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen Burns

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the new mat....so comfortable and easy to care for!
customer_reviews.author: Michele D

customer_reviews.title: Great rugs
customer_reviews.text: This rug is great. I have arthritis in my feet and this rug makes it easier to stand while I am in the kitchen. They stay in place and are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: musicmomma

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mat
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 other GelPro mats and just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Ulisse

customer_reviews.title: The price I paid for this is almost ridiculous because it's such a great price for an amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat to replace my other GelPro that unfortunately got ruined during a recent move (my own fault). The price I paid for this is almost ridiculous because it's such a great price for an amazing product! I have more than one of these mats, and love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This pad helps my feet feel comfortable while cooking and dishwashing.
customer_reviews.author: Jaco

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to clean, wish there was more variety in design and colors.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Cushy, superb comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I have already come back to purchase more of these. They are far superior to other brands I have tried. Their claim that you will not bottom out after standing on these for a while is 100% true and they are more bouncy than others, the comfort when standing on these on a concrete floor is superb! I got the Leather Grain finish and this is my only complaint... everything sticks to this. Footprints - yep, dog hair - yep, dust - yep, so you will be cleaning this all the time. I wish I had purchase a lighter color so this was less noticeable. But that is a minor gripe, they are worth it to me!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mary Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great floor mat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the ladies in the kitchen, so they would not have to stand on hard ground washing dishes. The only thing now I have to purchase the longer one for the other side when one is preparing smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: 1Time

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my dad one for his stand up desk and he LOVES IT. My boyfriend surprised me with this red one for work and I LOVE IT! Even if I'm wearing shoes it really helps to stand on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstyn Freeman

customer_reviews.title: A bummer
customer_reviews.text: Thought these were a good brand and they are very cushiony, however, they will not stay in place on my tile floor. They are always slipping and sliding. I want to keep using them,but I will need to get an anti-slip something to keep them in place, I bought them so I wouldn't have to do that, I may have to give them up and I bought 4 of them. Not Good!
customer_reviews.author: Kejebu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have rheumatoid arthritis and it is great for standing doing dishes, fixing meals, etc.. My joints thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SOLID!
customer_reviews.text: I have a standing setting at my desk and this was the answer to making it more comfortable to work standing up. Good price and quality. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Coombe

customer_reviews.title: not near as satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I received one last year through a friend from your sight, same company, brand. The texture is not quite the same and the color and no shine, yet I ordered, the exact same? not near as satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Love it. After back surgeries.....it helps when I have to stand for long periods of time in the kitchen. Cleans off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Hoddy

customer_reviews.title: I have larger GelPro mats in my home kitchen - this one is perfect for my smaller space at work
customer_reviews.text: Got a new convertible desk at work, but needed something softer than industrial carpet to stand on. I have larger GelPro mats in my home kitchen - this one is perfect for my smaller space at work.
customer_reviews.author: MissBell

customer_reviews.title: Great mats
customer_reviews.text: These are great--I ordered two, and they are pretty and perfect in my kitchen. Color is more "red wine" than it appears in the image.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our Travel Trailer and love it.
customer_reviews.author: gvsummer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, only wish I could cover the kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, only wish I could cover the kitchen floor with them. One in front of stove the other by Island for doing prep work.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Great sink mat
customer_reviews.text: Very cushiony and easy on the feet. Nice red color, doesn't show dog hair like my last mat
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hambright

customer_reviews.title: but seems durable & it is extremely comfortable to stand on
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a bit bigger, but seems durable & it is extremely comfortable to stand on.
customer_reviews.author: Idahokell

customer_reviews.title: UDATE: REPLACED! Originals after a year curled up became a hazard.
customer_reviews.text: "I own two of these, in a different color "Toasted Leather Grain", apparently no longer available. Were fine about a year until both started curling up around the edges.... all the way around to lift up about a half-inch. Causes a trip hazard." I was contacted by GelPro customer service who obviously reads the reviews and believes in standing behind their product well after the warranty. They replaced both of my 2 year old mats with new improved ones! Thanks you GelPro! These new ones are a lot nicer, the edges are formed downward so they hug the floor, and there is much less slippage on the floor. Much better! Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed - My first NewLife by GelPro Floor Mat ----- was the Leather Grain style – it was thick and luxurious - like standing on a cloud. When I ordered my second mat I needed a lighter color. Unfortunately the Leather Grain did not have a light color. So I ordered a pebble design. Big disappointment, it was much thinner and the material did not seem equal to the Leather Grain. When I compared the backs of both mats the Pebble material looked different and the top finish shiny and cheap with not much cushion.
customer_reviews.author: lsw

customer_reviews.title: Started out great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these mats for our kitchen. For about 6 months, they were great. Then the edges began to curl. By 8 months, the beveled edges had curled up to the point that they were no longer safe. We kept tripping over them. They are now in the trash. I would not recommend these to anyone. They are dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great On Feet but Not Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great for standing in the kitchen! 5 stars for keeping feet from getting fatigued. However...the reason for only 3 stars is obvious in the picture I attached. The edges of the mat, especially the corners, do not lay flat to the floor but curl or at least sit up slightly. Maybe this is being to picky, but because of this issue we have tripped on the mat so many times! Other potential buyers should be aware of this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: Black underside color bleeds onto floor, leaves stain
customer_reviews.text: This otherwise excellent product's underside is a thick sponge, which is ergonomically comfortable, but the color of the underside is, unfortunately, solid black. When my new,expensive stone kitchen floor became wet--as kitchen floors do--one edge of this mat's underside bled a dark stain onto the floor which has proved to be impossible to remove. I recommend buyers choose a kitchen mat product which shows a photo of the underside, which this one does not.
customer_reviews.author: bjc

customer_reviews.title: Lighter Color but Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought the smaller one and the larger one. I expected them to be a darker tan color, but they are actually a lighter beige. I kept them because I love them. They feel so good under my feet, very soft. They’re thick and don’t leave footprint impressions after standing on them. They weren’t rolled up when they arrived because they are too thick to roll. I was thrilled they weren’t rolled up. I’m very pleased with these mats.
customer_reviews.author: E. Weidman

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not the quality I’m used to from GelPro
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought GelPro mats for my kitchen for many years and I’ll have to say these are just ok and they will have to do during the pandemic since I can’t go shopping for them in person but they are not the quality I am used to from this company usually when I step on one of the mats it’s like stepping on a cool cloud on you kitchen floor but theses are a little stiff and firm but they are definitely better than having nothing on the floor. I hope they hold up ok, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: D Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Lighter Color but Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought the smaller one and the larger one. I expected them to be a darker tan color, but they are actually a lighter beige. I kept them because I love them. They feel so good under my feet, very soft. They’re thick and don’t leave footprint impressions after standing on them. They weren’t rolled up when they arrived because they are too thick to roll. I was thrilled they weren’t rolled up. I’m very pleased with these mats.
customer_reviews.author: E. Weidman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this mat, especially considering the price I paid for it on Amazon Warehouse. I don't find that it moves around much on my porcelain tile floor, and the size is perfect to put directly in front of the sink. I find myself lingering when washing the dishes now! So springy and cushiony! If you've never had comfortable kitchen mats before, then you will most likely love this one. If you don't, then I don't know what clouds you've been walking on!
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for our feet in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We have a long clinger and tile floors. This large size mat replaced two smaller ones we had been using that were conjoined. But that was a trip hazard. The old ones finally wore out and we are glad we got this larger replacement. Nice trip-free edges and super comfortable. Interestingly, under normal usage it tends to “walk” a bit on the floor as foot pressure is apparently sufficiently transmitter to the underside. This happens also with area rugs placed over carpets or hard floors. A suitable “friction pad” designed to minimize this effect will probably do the trick. But we haven’t tried that because the movement is minor and we easily push it back into position.
customer_reviews.author: G. Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Color is terrible
customer_reviews.text: This review is due to the color only - the mat itself is great quality and as described. It feels great to stand on vs my tile floors. However, the color is awful and not representative of the picture. The description and picture say/show Mineral Gray, but there is no gray. The background is like a denim look (not a solid color) and the pattern is a light blue. There is no gray or white on this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically, the print is very pretty. But this mat isn't as squishy as I expected based on a different brand we have in our kitchen. Part of it is that the surface material is pretty stiff, so you don't sink in the way you would with a more flexible material on top. I also wish it were thicker. I have found that if I double it on itself it has the amount of squish I expect/need. Not idea, but since it's so long, if you are using it for standing in place (such as at a standing desk) folding it over on itself isn't a bad solution.
customer_reviews.author: RSK

customer_reviews.title: The corners are DANGEROUS,  I have tripped at the stove turning with hot pots of liquid.  DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: These mats do not lay flat and cause tripping. They should be removed from the market place. They are NOT safe. DO NOT BUY!!!!!! Ground Hog Day 2015: So some time ago, we were contacted by the company and they offered to replace the mats with their top of the line GelPro Elite. They arrived this weekend and we started using them. They are absolutely stuck to the floor and DO NOT SLIDE. The edges HUG the ground and they are extremely comfortable to stand on. Thank you GelPro. The company went way beyond necessary to compensate us. These mats are the ones to buy. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Uhrich

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this is even gel
customer_reviews.text: I just didn't like the way this mat felt. I expected more of a slightly squishy feel with it being labeled as gel. It didn't conform to my feet when I stepped on it and maybe because the bottom is foam it just didn't feel uniform when I'd step on it. It seemed a little to thick due to the lack of "give" in it. I'll admit the longer mat for whatever reason felt alot better than the smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey N.

customer_reviews.title: Suck.
customer_reviews.text: "Anti-Fatigue ... Comfort ... Mat" ?????? "Thick Ergo-foam Core for Health and Wellness" ????????? I got none of that with this crap product. In fact, it actually made me feel worse than just standing on the hard floor. My feet went numb and my lower back killed everytime I tried standing on it. And if you like to go barefoot (I got it for my home office) the plastic top is not comfortable. I found a much better/nicer one through another retailer and it cost me less money. Just finished packaging this POS for return.
customer_reviews.author: MariaMaria

customer_reviews.title: Love my Gelllpro antifatigue mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this smaller Gelpro NewLife mat because it is just like the one my daughter and granddaughter bought me for Christmas in 2016. I love these mats and the 3/4" thickness. The one given to me in 2016 is still in great shape. I am walking and standing on it everyday, and it is still just like new. I would recommend to anyone these mats. They keep their color, they last, they are comfortable and they are sold at a great price. I am now 73 and because I have had degenerative disc disease since I was 27, these mats have help me when standing for periods of time. OUSTANDING MATS!
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Get the grasscloth
customer_reviews.text: This 5-star review is for the grasscloth textured mat. I have the grasscloth charcoal version, as well as the leather-grain navy version. The leather-grain is fine, but I think the grasscloth is a nicer texture on my skin and the mat's cushioning is slightly more comfortable than the leather-grain. I would give 4 stars to the leather-grain. Both mats are easy to clean, stay in place, and look nice in my house.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaW

customer_reviews.title: It was like a hard foam where you can se the hole ...
customer_reviews.text: The underside of the 20x32 mat seemed unfinished, unlike the 20x48 size I purchased. It was like a hard foam where you can see the hole patterns. The larger mat had a smooth finish underneath and seemed to be heavier/sturdier because of the smooth finish and loved that one!
customer_reviews.author: Rica L.

customer_reviews.title: I then bought Epica Super Grip padding on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: These slide all over the place (as do all of this type of rug). I tried tape, but that just made a mess and didn't work. I then bought Epica Super Grip padding on Amazon, used gorilla glue overnight to glue the padding to rug, and so far that has been better though not perfect. If you have cats or dogs, they will tear it up too. Our cats claws have done damage, unfortunately, as they love them. Still better than regular rugs, but not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cushiony and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Got a 20”x32” and a 20”x48”. Nice leather grain truffle color that blends in well on my wood floor. I’m still getting used to the extra thickness cause I tripped every time I walked up to it even though all sides are beveled. Surface is smooth without textures or patterns which makes it very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great size for me
customer_reviews.text: My "work at home" office is in the basement in Minnesota with only a thin carpet on top of concrete .... meaning, the floor gets COLD. A lot of good comfort mats exist in a larger size but they're intended for open floors (e.g. next to your sink) so they just don't fit under a computer table or desk. This (20x32) fits perfectly for me & provides comfort and insulation whether you work at home in shoes, slippers, socks, or barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Campea

customer_reviews.title: I bought this mat Dec. 25th 2017
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat! Bought it almost 2 years ago and it still looks just like the day I bought it. Still very comfortable and I have had no problems at all with the corners rolling up. I took this picture today Sept 18th 2019. I just put in new flooring so the mat color doesn't go this mat has held up so well I'm going to buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Jill P.

customer_reviews.title: Slippery suckers
customer_reviews.text: The product is as pictured and comfortable. Unfortunately it constantly moves every time you step on it. If you are in the kitchen a lot you will have to reposition it ten times a day. I put a desk chair mat under it and that has helped a bunch, but it still moves a tad. The manufacturer has to correct the problem or they will not sell a bunch more despite the fact the mats are handsome and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: lnhoj

customer_reviews.title: Every stain shows
customer_reviews.text: We have always had the "traditional" Gel Pro mats in our kitchen, but when we needed to replace them, this much less expensive option seemed perfect. Not so much. They're extremely comfortable, as promised. But they, especially the one in front of the stove shows EVERYTHING. We could literally wash them every day. And it's not just taking a wet cloth to it. I found the best way is to put them in a sink and use dish soap....NOT easy. In fairness, it could be that we chose black with no texture. But gosh! So....we'll probably end up going back to the more-expensive latticed Gel Pro. Lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: D. DiNardo

customer_reviews.title: your feet will thank you
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to cheaper foam mats from tj maxx, home depot etc. I bought this one because I wanted a longer mat in the kitchen. Whoa! It's Great! So much more soft and cushiony. A big difference when I step from it, to the cheap one by the sink. I'm thinking this would be PERFECT for a stand-up desk too. If you love to cook, (or stand at your job) your feet will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: citygirl

customer_reviews.title: Comfort over Appearance/sliding
customer_reviews.text: This product is very comfortable to stand on. It eases the discomfort of working at my sink. I made the mistake of buying a light colored one. Every little thing that is dropped on it seems to stain it. I wipe it off as soon as I see it but, it still look looks soiled. Also it does not stay in place very well. It moves when I step on it. Any suggestions from anyone?
customer_reviews.author: Granny Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great mat, but there was a hole on the back
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for my old gelpro mat. I had the classic. I'm not sure if this one is the elite since it wasn't stated on the description and the package it was in does not say so either. But they had different surfaces. This one has a smoother surface. It had a little hole on the back side when I received it that's about 3 mm deep x 2 mm wide. Not sure if it's from the manufacturing or from handling at some point (see picture). I just hope that it doesn't affect the life of the mat.
customer_reviews.author: imcs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Beautiful, but moves around constantly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Pomegranate and it's beautiful! It's also very comfortable to stand on. My biggest issue is it constantly moves around on our wood floors. I've tried the grips you use under mats but those did not help.
customer_reviews.author: sojourner765

customer_reviews.title: YOU CAN TRIP ON THIS IF YOU'RE NOT CAREFUL.
customer_reviews.text: The color wasn't exactly what I'd expected, but I placed the mat in front of my kitchen sink. It's sturdy and comfortable under foot, but I found it to be a tripping hazard and I gave it away, replacing it with a different style mat I found on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie brooklyn girl

customer_reviews.title: Dirt black when received
customer_reviews.text: While I like the product fine, the backing material is not as well made as the smaller one I got from Kangaroo. However, I can't get over the thin layer of black filth that's on the mat upon arrival. Maybe it's been sitting in the warehouse far too long, I had to wash it twice before using it. No one wants to receive a dirty, brand new whatsoever. The company should do a better job cleaning it before shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay in place on hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two mats for the kitchen. They will not stay in place on hardwoods floors. Double-stick tape is ineffective--it will not adhere to the bottom of the mat. The mats have to be moved back to their original positions several times a day. Also, the colors samples when ordering are not accurate. I had to return the first two I ordered. What appeared to be brown on the website was almost yellow, it had a pattern that was not clearly apparent , and the surface finish was shiny rather than matte. The ones I have now, Java, are a medium brown although look almost black on the website.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: This mat is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I've been previously buying cheap foam mats which attract dirt and is almost impossible to get out and would wear out quickly. I decided it made more sense to invest a little more and get better quality. This mat is easy to clean, very comfortable and I love the red leather grain look. I would definitely recommend this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila H.

customer_reviews.title: TWO PEOPLE ON A MAT
customer_reviews.text: HAVE BARELY HAD THIS MAT FOR TWO MONTHS AND THE RED IS ALREADY DEGRADING -- MY HUSBAND AND I ARE THE ONLY ONE S IN THE HOUSE AND HE ONLY HAS KITCHEN DUTY ON SUNDAYS - THIS COLOR DEGRADING SHOULDNT BE HAPPENING AS WE ARE VERY CAREFUL PEOPLE AND BARELY DROP WATER ON THIS MATT ... THOUGHLY DISAPPOINTED .........
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Great cushioning for tired feet
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use in front of kitchen sink; next day I went back and ordered 2 more! So now I'll be much more comfortable standing in kitchen and laundry room. The color is very nice, it doesn't slip at all, and the bevelled edge makes it safe for my husband''s walker. Spills wipe right off, and I can't imagine much (if anything) will stain it, since it's not porous. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ShopCat

customer_reviews.title: Do Dog hair EZ to clean
customer_reviews.text: We received our first shipment of this pad and loved it so much we ordered a bigger one, it came today and looks great in our kitchen and is comfortable to stand on. We are so excited with the assortment of colors and designs so we ordered 2 more. Now no more rugs to wash, no dog hair in our kitchen floors, and the colors brighten up our home. Great to wash dishes, cooking standing.
customer_reviews.author: CINDY CONLEY

customer_reviews.title: Love these mats.
customer_reviews.text: I had a cloth rug in front of sink, but it kept shifting. Not only does this mat have a great cushioning effect on the feet, it also doesn't move around! Love it. Bought a second one to place in front of my stove. Didn't know how much I needed these!
customer_reviews.author: Jay C

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, color
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my husband a few months ago. He does all the cooking and I wanted him to have a comfortable place to stand as well as have something easy to clean up spills. While a simple throw rug would catch dropped food and spills, it would do nothing to ease his legs when standing for lengthy periods of time. The Gel-Pro cushion floor mat did the trick! The pomegranate color matches perfectly to the accent color already in use in our kitchen. Anyway, it worked out so well for hubby that I bought this one for myself to use in front of the kitchen sink!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy (McGregory) Berry

customer_reviews.title: Design not durable
customer_reviews.text: I want to like these mats but I have been very disappointed in the durability, particularly for the cost. The design (tweed, in my case) is just a printed design and it wears off pretty quickly. We have spots on two mats in our kitchen that are only moderate traffic (in front of stove and sink) that show the same result.
customer_reviews.author: CuriousG

customer_reviews.title: Found It!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister Christmas 2016 and she told me she wants another one just like it. I ask if it held up and she said its in great shape that she just wanted another for the other side of her island,, lol... Score! Good present...Said she's had others but they didnt compare to the quality of this one. Said hers is still flat on the floor,, no curled up corners and it is still as cushy as it was when new.. you have to understand my sister cooks and cans all the time. Don't hesitate to buy this NewLife by GelPro rug... look no further,,, Bingo! Found it!
customer_reviews.author: PaulaMc

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this purchase. The pattern is close enough to match my dining tablecloth. I am also happy with the quality and the thickness – very comfortable to stand on it. This smaller comfort mat is just what I need for replacing the previous mat which was an oversized mat for the area.
customer_reviews.author: PAULINE LECOMPTE

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Description
customer_reviews.text: i bought this mat because ithe description indicating it would not slip around. I am a fall risk and have already come close to falling multie times as the mat slips around on my tile floor. Definitely false advertising
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to bend over constantly to put the rug back where it belongs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rug to use in my kitchen. It drives me crazy. Every time I step on it it moves. I bought rug grips to put on the bottom but that has not helped. The rug is comfortable but I am constantly bending over to put it back where it belongs. My floor is tile and other than nailing the rug down I am out of ideas.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Myrick

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to stand on, pebble finish is plasticky
customer_reviews.text: Thick and comfortable with beveled edges so easy to step onto. Perfect size for in front of sink. The pebble wheat color is light tan. The pebble material is more plasticky-looking and plasticky-feeling than I expected - it's really like vinyl, but feels ok underfoot. It will serve my purpose and the price was right, but if you want to show off your kitchen choose another material with a matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Disposable
customer_reviews.text: I've had three of these for two years, and I'm experiencing the same curling/trip hazard that you see in many of the reviews and pictures. Basically they work fine until they don't, so I'd you are OK with them being disposable then they are fine. I'm personally not okay with it, hence the low review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, great price! Happy customer! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I just received these yesterday, so I cannot speak as to how long they will last, but so far I LOVE THEM. I purchased two 20x32 mats in Lattice Mineral. The color is more of a grey/blue which is exactly what I was looking for! These were priced $20 less on Amazon than anywhere else. The material is very plush, and they seem like they will be easy to clean. I will provide an update after a few months with them!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rose

customer_reviews.title: Feels great on the legs~
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for the kitchen where I have a flagstone floor. One is in front of the sink and one is in front of the stove. What a pleasure to stand on! I haven't had them long enough to know how they will hold up but for now I'm loving them.
customer_reviews.author: K. J.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The navy blue color shows every spill and stain. It even shows the lotion from my feet. I used these a week. I was constantly wiping and cleaning them off.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Comfort first aide!
customer_reviews.text: This matt is great, design is perfect for the sink area in my kitchen. Nice cushion for tired old feet! Ha! Cleans up with just a sponge and water. If I had any criticism at all, it would be to say that it shifts around a bit when walking on it, but just nudge my foot against it to right it again into place.
customer_reviews.author: milhausen

customer_reviews.title: Eliminated back and feet pain
customer_reviews.text: This rug has all but eliminated my back and foot pain as a result of cooking. Definitely recommend it. The burgundy is a pretty color; however, for my taste, I’d prefer it to be darker. It looks more red than burgundy.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Freak

customer_reviews.title: What a great transaction from beginning to end
customer_reviews.text: WOW! What a great transaction from beginning to end. The seller was great. They did not waste any time getting my order ready to ship. I ordered this and received it in the mail very fast. It was packaged well so there was no damage to the item. The item was better than described, higher quality than I expected, and exactly what I was wanting when I ordered it. This is not cheaply made or cheaply packaged. I would highly recommend this seller and this product to anyone who is looking to invest or purchase anything similar to this.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Hackney

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertized !
customer_reviews.text: While these mats are indeed cushy while standing on them , there are however , some "issues " that make these items unacceptable . !. if you stand near an edge , the weight and pressure causes the mat to lift up on the opposite side ... OFTEN causing one to trip ... 2 . some reviews state these mats "stay " in place ... this is NOT my experience at all . They most certainly can and do move frequently and are difficult to slide back into desired place using your foot . You MUST readjust position by hand . I would not purchase these mats again nor do I recommend them primarily because of tripping hazzard .
customer_reviews.author: gingerbelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice floor mat with some style
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my kitchen with almond color cupboards, stainless appliances and caramel/coffee color granite. Very happy that it looks exactly like the photos in advertising. Gave it a 4 just because it was so pricey. But, I would pay the same again for it. I really like the colors and design
customer_reviews.author: spats

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mat
customer_reviews.text: The NewLife by GelPro Kitchen Floor Mat is nothing short of great. When you are spending significant time working in the kitchen this mat is a must have! It is unbelievably comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G.

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift for my BFF
customer_reviews.text: Her old mats were curling up on the edges and were a trip hazard. Got her this mat and she loved it. She asked me a year later for the link because she wanted 2 more to match she loved it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality Mat
customer_reviews.text: I am using the mat in my kitchen prep area. It is comfortable to stand on & seems to be well made, it was a bit pricey, but worth the cost. It is a little thicker than I am used to, but the beveled edge keeps it from being a tripping hazard. I'm considering purchasing another one for an adjacent area.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Blackman

customer_reviews.title: Durable and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our kitchen for when I'm preparing and cooking meals - it works great for keeping my feet and my joints happy through the whole process. I bought one in a kind of spring green color, which is true to the images in the listing, and it's durable and has lasted well. My only complaint is that it lacks some kind of non-skid backing, so it tends to travel a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: two20-somethings

customer_reviews.title: Found just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: My original Gel-Pro mat was about 10 years old, and was starting to crack on the sides, causing a tripping hazard. The size I need is 72 inches long, which makes them pretty pricey. i happened to find a "used-excellent condition" one on Amazon (maybe a customer return?) $100 less than the list price. Perfect condition, the exact color and style I wanted. Very soft and cushion-y, but not as heavy-weight as my previous one, so easier to clean and move.
customer_reviews.author: Maggiemayk71

customer_reviews.title: These are great mats!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these anti-fatigue mats. I have 2 in my kitchen; a long one in front of sink and dishwasher, and a smaller one where I stand for food prep, etc. So nice to stand on!
customer_reviews.author: NanHG

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE! I didn't know how much relief I was missing without them.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for our kitchen and I have since realized how much strain was being put on my joints from standing on our hard tile kitchen floor. I love how easy they clean up and the color is really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Diana John Jamerson

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen mat
customer_reviews.text: I usually rate everything I buy and fir the most part, I am generous with my ratings. But, this mat slides on my floor constantly, which makes it dangerous when the lights are off. I trip over it because it's not where it should be. So disappointed. Won't buy their products anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Haywire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat. It is so thick and cushioned. Love the color charcoal. It is very easy to clean. I havd it in front of my sink in the kitchen. Looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Work at home on comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat and I got the brown color because it does not stand out on my hard wood floors. Delivery was great and very good quality. Helps me because I stand up at my home office most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of happy baby boy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely reduces foot pain
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I had no idea there was such a difference in gel mats. I've had others and they do not measure up to this mat. I am very impressed and I appreciate how much it helps foot pain. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Agai
customer_reviews.text: We love this mat, it is almost the same color as our hardwood floor and doesn’t distract from the look/style of our kitchen. It’s comfortable and very easy to clean. It’s nice and thick, providing plenty of support. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Just4Today

product_meta.title: GelPro Stain Resistant Surface with 3/4 Thick Ergo-foam Core for Health and Wellness, 20" x 32", Leather Grain Cranberry
product_meta.description:
Reduce Fatigue, Prevent Feet, Legs and Lower Back Pain and Add Up To Your Working Space’s Decoration Thanks to the Ultimate, Most Stylish, Decorative Foam Floor Mat! 

If you are a chef, a bartender, a retail shop assistant or you simply spend long hours standing, aching feet, lower back pain and discomfort are part of your daily life. 

If you have been looking for a way to soothe pain and remain comfortable throughout the day, your quest stops here! 

The NewLife anti-fatigue standing mat by GelPro is bound to give the solution to your problem, providing you with unmatched support and comfort! 

3/4” Thick Ergo-Foam Core Standing Mat Which Reduces Fatigue While Standing 

Forget about cheaply made, thin and sinking foam mats which fail to support your body and prevent pain. 

This premium quality kitchen and office mat for standing features a 3/4’’ thick ergo-foam core which can provide soothing relief, allowing you to stand for long periods of time while remaining perfectly comfortable. 

Durable, Stain Resistant Construction, Bevelled Edges and Stylish Grass Cloth Pattern 

This ergonomic foot comfort mat features an extremely durable construction that assures unmatched longevity. 

In addition, its beveled, non-curling edges prevent tripping accidents while the non-slip bottom keeps the mat in place, preventing it from slipping on the floor. 

The stain-resistant surface allows you to effortlessly keep it clean! 

Last but not least, the striking, classy grass cloth pattern makes this kitchen and stand up desk mat the perfect addition to any environment, adding style to your living and working spaces. 

Click Add To Cart Now And Make This Comfort Standing Mat Yours While Supplies Still Last!
feature_bullets: THICK, SUPPORTIVE ERGO-FOAM CORE: This anti-fatigue cushion mat for standing features a 3/4’’ thick ergo-foam core which can provide excellent support and prevent feet, legs and back pain.
SLIP RESISTANT, SAFETY BOTTOM: This kitchen and desk standing mat features a steady, non-skid bottom surface that assures maximum safety, effectively preventing slipping accidents.
BEVELLED EDGES AND DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: The NewLife by GelPro cushion comfort mat features beveled edges that will not curl, protecting you from tripping over it.
EASY TO KEEP CLEAN: Featuring a stain resistant surface, this chef kitchen anti-fatigue floor standing mat is incomparably easy to keep clean.

STYLISH PATTERNS: Whether you want to use this extreme comfort mat in your kitchen or at work, it is the perfect choice! Available in multiple patterns and colors, you can find a style that is bound to impress.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
